ResearchProjectDef.label: Quirium Power Cells
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks production of quirium power cells at fabricators. Quirium is a highly unstable element produced by accelerated uranium decay, and is the only thing that can meet the energy needs of transmution reactors.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Transmution Reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks construction of a transmution reactor - an advanced device that can convert resources using power cells. Also unlocks the transmution of wood and marble blocks from other resources, and the production of voxels from nowhere.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Metal Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of steel and silver from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Metal Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of gold, uranium, and jade from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Plasteel Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of plasteel from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Textile Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of cloth, bluefur, and camelhide from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Textile Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of synthread and devilstrand from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hyperweave Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of hyperweave from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medical Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of herbal medicine from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Medical Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of neutroamine and industrial medicine from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Food Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of nutrient paste meals from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Food Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of meat, vegetables and simple meals from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Drug Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of Penoxycyline, smokeleaf joints, and psychite tea from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Drug Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of yayo, flake, wake-up and go-juice from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Drug Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of luciferium from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Component Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of components from other resources.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Liquid Transmution
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the transmution of chemfuel and wort from other resources.
